text: The Battle of Akre, was a significant military engagement during the 1983-1986 Kurdish rebellions in Iraq. The Peshmerga, led by Hoshyar Zebary and Col. Babakr, launched an attack on government forces in the city of Akre. The battle ended in a Kurdish victory, and a significant losses among the Iraqi lines. https://partipedia.org/en/articles/%DA%AF%D8%B4%D8%AA-%D8%A8%D8%A7%D8%A8%DB%95%D8%AA%DB%95%DA%A9%D8%A7%D9%86/the- battle-inside-akre-city-1983 ==Refrences==
title: Battle of Akre (1983)
